tools.name: gto_fastq_to_fasta
tools.description: Converts a FASTQ file format to a pseudo FASTA file. It does NOT align the sequence. It extracts the sequence and adds a pseudo header.

tools.name: gto_fastq_to_mfasta
tools.description: Converts a FASTQ file format to a pseudo Multi-FASTA file. It does NOT align the sequence. It extracts the sequence and adds each header in a Multi-FASTA format.

tools.name: gto_fastq_exclude_n
tools.description: Discards the FASTQ reads with the minimum number of 'N' symbols. If present, it will erase the second header (after +).

tools.name: gto_fastq_extract_quality_scores
tools.description: Extracts all the quality-scores from FASTQ reads.

tools.name: gto_fastq_info
tools.description: Analyses the basic information of FASTQ file format.

tools.name: gto_fastq_maximum_read_size
tools.description: Filters the FASTQ reads with the length higher than the value defined. If present, it will erase the second header (after +).

tools.name: gto_fastq_minimum_quality_score
tools.description: Discards reads with average quality-score below of the defined.

tools.name: gto_fastq_minimum_read_size
tools.description: Filters the FASTQ reads with the length smaller than the value defined. If present, it will erase the second header (after +).

tools.name: gto_fastq_rand_extra_chars
tools.description: Substitutes in the FASTQ files, the DNA sequence the outside ACGT chars by random ACGT symbols.

tools.name: gto_fastq_from_seq
tools.description: Converts a genomic sequence to pseudo FASTQ file format.

tools.name: gto_fastq_mutate
tools.description: Creates a synthetic mutation of a FASTQ file given specific rates of mutations, deletions and additions.

tools.name: gto_fastq_split
tools.description: Splits Paired End files according to the direction of the strand ('/1' or '/2'). It writes by default singleton reads as forward stands.

tools.name: gto_fastq_pack
tools.description: Packages each FASTQ read in a single line. It can show the read score first or the dna sequence, depending on the execution mode.

tools.name: gto_fastq_unpack
tools.description: Unpacks the FASTQ reads packaged using the gto_fastq_pack tool.

tools.name: gto_fastq_quality_score_info
tools.description: Analyses the quality-scores of a FASTQ file.

tools.name: gto_fastq_quality_score_min
tools.description: Analyses the minimal quality-scores of a FASTQ file.

tools.name: gto_fastq_quality_score_max
tools.description: Analyses the maximal quality-scores of a FASTQ file.

tools.name: gto_fastq_cut
tools.description: Cuts read sequences in a FASTQ file. It requires that the initial and end positions for the cut.

tools.name: gto_fastq_minimum_local_quality_score_forward
tools.description: Filters the reads considering the quality score average of a defined window size of bases.

tools.name: gto_fastq_minimum_local_quality_score_reverse
tools.description: Filters the reverse reads, considering the quality score average of a defined window size of bases.

tools.name: gto_fastq_xs
tools.description: A skilled FASTQ read simulation tool, flexible, portable (does not need a reference sequence) and tunable in terms of sequence complexity. XS handles Ion Torrent, Roche-454, Illumina and ABI-SOLiD simulation sequencing types. It has several running modes, depending on the time and memory available, and is aimed at testing computing infrastructures, namely cloud computing of large-scale projects, and testing FASTQ compression algorithms. Moreover, XS offers the possibility of simulating the three main FASTQ components individually (headers, DNA sequences and quality-scores). Quality-scores can be simulated using uniform and Gaussian distributions.

tools.name: gto_fastq_clust_reads
tools.description: Agroups reads and creates an index file. It cluster reads in therms of Seq k-mer Lexicographical order.

tools.name: gto_fastq_complement
tools.description: Replaces the ACGT bases with their complements in a FASTQ file format.

tools.name: gto_fastq_reverse
tools.description: Reverses the ACGT bases order for each read in a FASTQ file format.

tools.name: gto_fastq_variation_map
tools.description: Identifies the variation that occurs in the sequences relative to the reads or a set of reads. The (probabilistic) Bloom filter is automatically set.

tools.name: gto_fastq_variation_filter
tools.description: Filters and segments the regions of singularity from the output of gto_fastq_variation_map.

tools.name: gto_fastq_variation_visual
tools.description: Depicts the regions of singularity using the output from gto_fastq_variation_filter into an SVG image.

tools.name: gto_fastq_metagenomics
tools.description: An ultra-fast method to infer metagenomic composition of sequenced reads relative to a database. gto_fastq_metagenomics measures similarity between any FASTQ file (or FASTA), independently from the size, against any multi-FASTA database, such as the entire set of complete genomes from the NCBI. gto_fastq_metagenomics supports single reads, paired-end reads, and compositions of both. It has been tested in many platforms, such as Illumina MySeq, HiSeq, Novaseq, IonTorrent. gto_fastq_metagenomics is efficient to detect the presence and authenticate a given species in the FASTQ reads. The core of the method is based on relative data compression. gto_fastq_metagenomics uses variable multi-threading, without multiplying the memory for each thread, being able to run efficiently in a common laptop.

tools.name: gto_fasta_to_seq
tools.description: Converts a FASTA or Multi-FASTA file format to a seq.

tools.name: gto_fasta_from_seq
tools.description: Converts a genomic sequence to pseudo FASTA file format.

tools.name: gto_fasta_extract
tools.description: Extracts sequences from a FASTA file, which the range is defined by the user in the parameters.

tools.name: gto_fasta_extract_by_read
tools.description: Extracts sequences from each read in a Multi-FASTA file (splited by \n), which the range is defined by the user in the parameters.

tools.name: gto_fasta_info
tools.description: Shows the readed information of a FASTA or Multi-FASTA file format.

tools.name: gto_fasta_mutate
tools.description: Creates a synthetic mutation of a FASTA file given specific rates of editions, deletions and additions.

tools.name: gto_fasta_rand_extra_chars
tools.description: Substitutes in the DNA sequence the outside ACGT chars by random ACGT symbols. It works both in FASTA and Multi-FASTA file formats.

tools.name: gto_fasta_extract_read_by_pattern
tools.description: Extracts reads from a Multi-FASTA file format given a pattern in the header. Also, this pattern is case insensitive.

tools.name: gto_fasta_find_n_pos
tools.description: Reports the 'N' regions in a sequence or FASTA (seq) file.

tools.name: gto_fasta_split_reads
tools.description: Splits a Multi-FASTA file to multiple FASTA files.

tools.name: gto_fasta_rename_human_headers
tools.description: Changes the headers of FASTA or Multi-FASTA file to simple chrX by order, where X is the number.

tools.name: gto_fasta_extract_pattern_coords
tools.description: Extracts the header and coordinates from a Multi-FASTA file format given a pattern/motif in the sequence.

tools.name: gto_fasta_complement
tools.description: Replaces the ACGT bases with their complements in FASTA or Multi-FASTA file format.

tools.name: gto_fasta_reverse
tools.description: Reverses the order of a FASTA or Multi-FASTA file format.

tools.name: gto_fasta_variation_map
tools.description: This tool is an alias to gto_fastq_variation_map tool. Please check the documentation of this tool in the in the section of FASTQ tools.

tools.name: gto_fasta_variation_filter
tools.description: This tool is an alias to gto_fastq_variation_filter tool. Please check the documentation of this tool in the in the section of FASTQ tools.

tools.name: gto_fasta_variation_visual
tools.description: This tool is an alias to gto_fastq_variation_visual tool. Please check the documentation of this tool in the in the section of FASTQ tools.

tools.name: gto_fasta_split_streams
tools.description: Splits and writes a FASTA file into three channels of information: headers, extra and DNA.

tools.name: gto_fasta_merge_streams
tools.description: It merges the three channels of information (headers, extra and DNA) and writes it into a FASTA file.

tools.name: gto_amino_acid_to_group
tools.description: Converts an amino acid sequence to a group sequence.

tools.name: gto_amino_acid_to_pseudo_dna
tools.description: Converts an amino acid (protein) sequence to a pseudo DNA sequence.

tools.name: gto_amino_acid_compressor
tools.description: A new lossless compressor to compress efficiently amino acid sequences (proteins). It uses a cooperation between multiple context and substitutional tolerant context models. The cooperation between models is balanced with weights that benefit the models with better performance according to a forgetting function specific for each model.

tools.name: gto_amino_acid_from_fasta
tools.description: Converts DNA sequences in FASTA or Multi-FASTA file format to an amino acid sequence.

tools.name: gto_amino_acid_from_fastq
tools.description: Converts DNA sequences in the FASTQ file format to an amino acid sequence.

tools.name: gto_amino_acid_from_seq
tools.description: Converts DNA sequence to an amino acid sequence.

tools.name: gto_genomic_gen_random_dna
tools.description: Generates a synthetic DNA.

tools.name: gto_genomic_rand_seq_extra_chars
tools.description: Substitutes in the DNA sequence the outside ACGT chars by random ACGT symbols. It works in sequence file formats.

tools.name: gto_genomic_dna_mutate
tools.description: Creates a synthetic mutation of a sequence file given specific rates of mutations, deletions and additions.

tools.name: gto_genomic_extract
tools.description: Extracts sequences from a sequence file, which the range is defined by the user in the parameters.

tools.name: gto_genomic_period
tools.description: Calculates the best order depth of a sequence, using FCMs. It only works "ACGT", while the rest will be discarded.

tools.name: gto_genomic_count_bases
tools.description: Counts the number of bases in sequence, FASTA or FASTQ files.

tools.name: gto_genomic_compressor
tools.description: Able to provide additional compression gains over several top specific tools, while as an analysis tool, it is able to determine absolute measures, namely for many distance computations, and local measures, such as the information content contained in each element, providing a way to quantify and locate specific genomic events.

tools.name: gto_genomic_complement
tools.description: Replaces the ACGT bases with their complements in a DNA sequence. It works in sequence file formats.

tools.name: gto_genomic_reverse
tools.description: Reverses the ACGT bases order for each read in a sequence file.

tools.name: gto_char_to_line
tools.description: Splits a sequence into lines, creating an output sequence which has a char for each line.

tools.name: gto_new_line_on_new_x
tools.description: Splits different rows with a new empty row.

tools.name: gto_upper_bound
tools.description: Sets an upper bound in a file with a value per line.

tools.name: gto_lower_bound
tools.description: Sets an lower bound in a file with a value per line.

tools.name: gto_brute_force_string
tools.description: Generates all combinations, line by line, for an inputted alphabet and specific size.

tools.name: gto_real_to_binary_with_threshold
tools.description: Converts a sequence of real numbers into a binary sequence, given a threshold. The numbers below to the threshold will be 0.

tools.name: gto_sum
tools.description: Adds decimal values in file, line by line, splitted by spaces or tabs.

tools.name: gto_filter
tools.description: Filters numerical sequences using a low-pass filter.

tools.name: gto_word_search
tools.description: Search for a word in a file. It is case sensitive.

tools.name: gto_permute_by_blocks
tools.description: Permutates by block sequence, FASTA and Multi-FASTA files.

tools.name: gto_info
tools.description: Gives the basic properties of the file, namely size, cardinality, distribution percentage of the symbols, among others.

input.format: text, Multi-FASTA, FASTA, FASTQ, NUM, DNA, RNA, AminoAcids

tools.name: gto_segment
tools.description: Segments a filtered sequence based on a threshold.

tools.name: gto_comparative_map
tools.description: Creates a visualization for comparative maps.

tools.name: gto_max
tools.description: Computes the maximum value in each row between two files.

tools.name: gto_min
tools.description: Computes the minium value in each row between two files.
